bill.title: Public construction contracts; prohibit agreements with labor organizations.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 31-7-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Prohibit State Agencies And Local Governments From Requiring Certain Agreements With Labor Organizations By Contractors As A Condition Of Bidding On Projects; To Create The Employee Fair Solicitation Act Of 2014; To Create Section 71-1-51, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide Definitions And To Enact Minimum Standards For Disclosure, Documentation And Enforcement Of Employee Financial Obligations To Labor Organizations; To Amend Sections 71-1-45, 71-1-49 And 97-19-39, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Prescribe Minimum Standards For Disclosure, Documentation And Enforcement Of Employee Financial Obligations To Labor Organizations; To Provide For Redress Of Violations; And For Related Purposes.
